Taglines.sphere: Connect three or more balls of the same color in row or column line. If spheres amount at line is more than three, you will get a Super Orb.
Taglines.tetris: Fold shapes to the glassful bottom, filling in the horizontal rows, the higher the row, the more points. You can also control by the arrow keys.
Taglines.tetcolor: Stack blocks, collecting colors three in a row in any of three directions (horizontal, vertical, diagonal). You can also control the arrow keys.
Taglines.slicing: Point sum increases due removed squares amount by the arithmetic progression. Collect them in a bunch, of the same color, it will give a huge advantage.
Taglines.sapper: You have to walk through a long minefield, but you know that the sapper is mistaken only once.
Taglines.number: Add the same numbers, collect multipliers that increase an points amount for several times.
Taglines.filler: Capture colors of the whole field - the bot in the opposite corner will interfere you.
Taglines.circuit: Make a short circuit, connect the poles with different electric charges by conductors rotating.
Taglines.bouncer: Knock out stones with the same colors, which are closely. Point sum increases due removed squares amount by the arithmetic progression.
Taglines.barrel: Add a required mass to barrels on the field and start a chain reaction.
